name: A. Flores - 1975 Gran Reserva - Desflorado - RobustoÂ
additionalNotes: PDR A. Flores 1975 Gran Reserva is a medium-bodied blend honoring Abe Flores, one of the best master blenders in the industry, with four different wrappers: Dominican Corojo 2006, Connecticut Ecuador, Habano Sun Grown Ecuador, and Maduro Mexican San Andres. The cigar is handcrafted with Dominican and Nicaraguan Long-filler leaves dropped over a Dominican binder with one of the four wrappers.
